org.fxyz3d.concurrent

Class AbstractLoopService

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.concurrent.Service<V>
      • javafx.concurrent.ScheduledService<java.lang.Void>
        • org.fxyz3d.concurrent.AbstractLoopService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.concurrent.Worker<java.lang.Void>, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public abstract class AbstractLoopService
extends javafx.concurrent.ScheduledService<java.lang.Void>
    Simple Looping Service. Useful for games, Simulations, or other items that require a running "Loop".
